0.title: Revises provisions relating to elections. (BDR 34-8)
0.description: AN ACT relating to elections; revising the districts from which the members of the Board of Regents of the University of Nevada are elected; temporarily revising the deadline for a candidate for judicial office to file a declaration of candidacy; and providing other matters properly relating thereto.

1.title: Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-7)
1.description: Providing that no allowances will be paid for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications.

2.title: Memorializes the late Reverend Richard Dick Snyder. (BDR R-10)
2.description: Memorializing the late Reverend Richard Dick Snyder.

3.title: Expresses appreciation to the Assembly staff for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-14)
3.description: Expressing appreciation to the Assembly staff for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.

4.title: Expresses appreciation to the staff of the Legislative Counsel Bureau for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-15)
4.description: Expressing appreciation to the staff of the Legislative Counsel Bureau for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.

5.title: Adopts the Joint Rules of the Senate and Assembly for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-3)
5.description: Adopting the Joint Rules of the Senate and Assembly for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.

6.title: Memorializes former State Senator and Congressman James Hubert Bilbray. (BDR R-11)
6.description: Memorializing former State Senator and Congressman James Hubert Bilbray.

7.title: Revises the election districts for members of the Legislature, members of the State Board of Education and Representatives in Congress and the petition districts for certain statewide initiatives or referendums. (BDR 17-9)
7.description: AN ACT relating to elections; revising the districts from which members of the Legislature, members of the State Board of Education and Representatives in Congress are elected; revising the petition districts for certain initiatives or referendums proposing statewide ballot measures; authorizing the Chair of the Legislative Commission to direct the Legislative Counsel Bureau to contract for professional and other services for certain actions or proceedings relating to election or petition districts; and providing other matters properly relating thereto.

8.title: Adopts the Rules of the Senate for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-1)
8.description: Adopting the Rules of the Senate for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.

9.title: Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-6)
9.description: Providing that no allowances will be paid for the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications.

10.title: Recognizes the appointment of the Senate staff. (BDR R-4)
10.description: Recognizing the appointment of the Senate staff.

11.title: Expresses appreciation to the Senate staff for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-12)
11.description: Expressing appreciation to the Senate staff for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.

12.title: Expresses appreciation to the staff of the Legislative Counsel Bureau for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-13)
12.description: Expressing appreciation to the staff of the Legislative Counsel Bureau for their service during the 33rd Special Session of the Nevada Legislature.
